casebody.data:
State
v.
William Sheldon Howell 455P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2016 Edward Eldred, Attorney at Law, for Howell, William Sheldon. Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of December 2016."
